snippet: When Russia’s politicized state media talks about those who pulled off what the Kremlin calls a coup in Kiev, they have men like Dmytro Yarosh in mind.
abstract: Dmytro Yarosh, leader of Ukraine's far-right coalition known as Right Sector, says he is running for president; while Russian media has demonized men like Yarosh for pulling off coup in Kiev, little is known about him beyond lifetime involvement in right-wing causes.
lead_paragraph: When Russia’s politicized state media talks about those who pulled off what the Kremlin calls a coup in Kiev, they have men like Dmytro Yarosh in mind.

headline.main: Front and Center in Ukraine Race, a Leader of the Far Right
headline.print_headline: A Far-Right Leader Is Front and Center in Kiev
